name: People Summary
description: Provides a summary of information about the people that have visited you and those that you favorited

name: Recently Visited
description: Provides enhanced functionality for the list of Recently Visited members, including the ability to store and maintain more than just the past 8 visitors.

name: You Might Like
description: Provides additional settings for the You Might Like panel on the home screen.

name: Match Search Enhancements
description: Additional options for the match search window - highlight already visited profiles and more
